Address.label: Address
Address.value: 29 ABBA HUSHI AVENUE,CHECK-CAP BUILDING, P.O. BOX 1271, ISFIYA, 3009000, Israel

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Check-Cap Ltd is a clinical-stage medical diagnostics company engaged in the development of an ingestible imaging capsule that utilizes low-dose X-rays for the detection and imaging of colonic polyps and colorectal cancers, or CRC. The company is developing C-Scan, the first capsule-based system for preparation-free, colorectal cancer screening. Its scanning capsule will be swallowed and propelled by natural motility through the gastrointestinal tract and excreted naturally with no need for retrieval for data collection.
